data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 891 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Gagaifomauga.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gagaifomauga, Samoa
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Gagaifomauga to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 891 believers in Gagaifomauga to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Spirit, guide seekers in Gagaifomauga, Samoa to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Sasina
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Sasina, Gagaifomauga, Samoa.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Gagaifomauga, Samoa to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Gagaifomauga, Samoa.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Gagaifomauga, Samoa has a population of 4,800.

We estimate Gagaifomauga has 891 people who might know Jesus, 3,724 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 184 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Gagaifomauga, Samoa to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
